body: This library is better in every way. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/2175)

comment_data.body: I'd rather leave that up to the cloner.
Please add a  comment what this does/why it's needed.

comment_regular_data.body:
single file lib. i love it. :+1:  :heart: 
why can't everything be a single file lib ...

commit.message:
refactor: Use cmp instead of msgpack-c for events packing.

This library is better in every way.
